fields.date: Date of the tournament or single round
fields.points: Total points scored including tossups and sixty-second rounds

quarters.Q1: Team tossup points scored in Quarter 1
quarters.Q2: Team sixty-second round points scored in Quarter 2
quarters.Q3: Team tossup points scored in Quarter 3
quarters.Q4: Team sixty-second round points scored in Quarter 4
quarters.round_total: Total team points for the round

fields.date: Date of the tournament or single round
fields.qtrs_played: Number of quarters the player participated in
fields.Q1_ind: Individual tossup points scored in Quarter 1
fields.Q2: Team sixty-second round points credited while player was in
fields.Q3_ind: Individual tossup points scored in Quarter 3
fields.Q4: Team sixty-second round points credited while player was in
fields.team_points_with_player: Total team points scored while this player was in the game

team_results.w-l: Proportion of teams defeated; primary stat for placement
team_results.%: Win-loss record expressed as a single number
team_results.points: Total points scored including tossups and sixty-second rounds

individual_results.ind_tu_points: Total tossup points scored by the player
individual_results.qtrs_played: Number of quarters the player participated in
individual_results.Q1_ind: Individual tossup points scored in Quarter 1
individual_results.Q2: Team sixty-second round points credited while player was in
individual_results.Q3_ind: Individual tossup points scored in Quarter 3
individual_results.Q4: Team sixty-second round points credited while player was in
individual_results.team_points_with_player: Total team points scored while this player was in the game
